snippet: Unlike annual medical checkups, the idea of regular mental health checkups is less established, but early diagnosis can avert suffering and save money.
abstract: Regular mental health checkups are less established than annual medical checkups, but early diagnosis can avert suffering and save money.
lead_paragraph: Unlike annual medical checkups, the idea of regular mental health checkups is less established, but early diagnosis can avert suffering and save money.

headline.seo: The Importance of Regular Mental Health Checkups
headline.main: A Regular Checkup Is Good for the Mind as Well as the Body
headline.print_headline: A Regular Checkup Is Good for the Mind As Well as the Body
